trans-unit.source: Allows activity designer developers to add custom glyph providers to an activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Permite aos programadores estruturador adicionar fornecedores de glifo personalizado para um designer de atividade de atividade.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Classes that implement this interface can add and remove custom glyph providers--any classes that implement the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerGlyphProvider> interface -- to and from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> classes.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]As classes que implemente esta interface podem adicionar e remover fornecedores de glifo personalizado – quaisquer classes que implementam o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerGlyphProvider>interface – e para <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>classes.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerGlyphProvider>

trans-unit.source: Adds a class that implements the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerGlyphProvider"></xref> interface to the list of glyph providers that an activity designer uses.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona uma classe que implementa o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerGlyphProvider"> </xref> interface à lista de fornecedores de glifo que utiliza um designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: Gets a generic read-only collection of designer glyph providers.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de só de leitura genérica de fornecedores de glifo estruturador.

trans-unit.source: GlyphProviders returns an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerGlyphProvider> collection that is associated with a specific <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: GlyphProviders devolve uma <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerGlyphProvider>coleção que está associada um específico <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerGlyphProvider>

trans-unit.source: Removes the class that implements the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerGlyphProvider"></xref> interface to the list of glyph providers that an activity designer uses.
trans-unit.target: Remove a classe que implementa o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerGlyphProvider"> </xref> interface à lista de fornecedores de glifo que utiliza um designer de atividade.
